mapper.select: SELECT 1 AS T_LEVEL, R.DEPT_ID AS ID, R.DEPT_NM AS TEXT, R.UP_DEPT_ID AS PARENT, 'unit' AS TYPE, R.DEPT_ID, R.DEPT_NM, R.UP_DEPT_ID, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TB_CM04M01 WHERE DEPT_ID = R.UP_DEPT_ID) AS UP_DEPT_NM, R.SORT_NO, R.USE_YN FROM TB_CM04M01 R ORDER BY T_LEVEL, SORT_NO
SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, UP_DEPT_ID, (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM TB_CM04M01 WHERE DEPT_ID = A.UP_DEPT_ID) UP_DEPT_NM, SORT_NO, USE_YN FROM TB_CM04M01 A WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM04M01 WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO TB_CM04M01 A USING DUAL ON (A.DEPT_ID = #{deptId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DEPT_NM = #{deptNm}, SORT_NO = #{sortNo}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, UDT_ID = #{userId}, UDT_PGM = #{pgmId}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( DEPT_ID, DEPT_NM, UP_DEPT_ID, SORT_NO, USE_YN, CREAT_ID, CREAT_PGM, CREAT_DTTM ) VALUES( #{deptId}, #{deptNm}, #{upDeptId}, #{sortNo}, #{useYn}, #{userId}, #{pgmId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CM04M01 SET UP_DEPT_ID = #{upDeptId}, SORT_NO = #{sortNo} WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
